Name: Colors! Maze 2
About the game: Colors! Maze 2 is a minimalist casual game of easy mazes with relaxing music. The player controls the ball, which must find the exit to the portal. ⮞ 100 Levels ⮞ 100 Achievements ⮞ Easy Mazes ⮞ Intuitive Interface ⮞ Relaxing music Music by: Tungerman Pixel-Art by: Solluco
